level.text: Within 90 days of April 8, 2011, the Mayor, pursuant to subchapter I of Chapter 5 of Title 2, shall issue rules to implement the provisions of this subchapter.
All rules promulgated under this subchapter shall be submitted to the Council for review and approval.

level.heading: Effect of Amendments
level.text: D.C. Law 18-365 substituted "Within 90 days of April 8, 2011" for "Within 90 days of February 2, 2008".

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For Law 17-103, see notes following ยง 50-1641.01.
For history of Law 18-365, see notes under ยง 50-1641.05.
